statements: SELECT * FROM confidential_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensitive_info, access_level FROM confidential_data WHERE access_level = 'top secret';
SELECT id, sensitive_info FROM confidential_data WHERE access_level = 'confidential' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, access_level FROM confidential_data WHERE access_level = 'restricted' AND access_granted_by = 100;
SELECT * FROM confidential_data WHERE encryption_key LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT id, sensitive_info FROM confidential_data WHERE access_level='top secret'
SELECT * FROM confidential_data WHERE access_level='restricted' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, access_level, access_granted_by FROM confidential_data WHERE id > 100 AND access_level='confidential'
SELECT id, sensitive_info, encryption_key FROM confidential_data WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, access_granted_by, access_level FROM confidential_data WHERE access_level='restricted' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'personal';
SELECT data_id, data_owner, encryption_key FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_owner = 'Alice' AND data_type = 'Private';
SELECT data_id, data_content, encryption_key FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'Confidential';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'User' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user
SELECT user_id, username FROM user
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM role
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM access_control
SELECT username, role_name FROM user JOIN role ON user.user_id = role.role_id
SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM role ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM user u JOIN access_control ac ON u.user_id = ac.user_id JOIN role r ON ac.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM access_control GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT username, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level='admin';
SELECT * FROM encryption_key ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_content FROM data_security WHERE encrypted=true;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_time FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id=100;
SELECT * FROM access_control ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level='admin';
SELECT * FROM encryption_key WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT data_content, encryption_algorithm FROM data_security WHERE encrypted='true';
SELECT event_type, event_time FROM audit_logs ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE access_level = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 5;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Admin%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
